title: 99.9% Isopropyl IPA Disinfecting, Cleaning & Degreasing Trigger Spray 500ml Lab Grade
features: 𝗣𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗜𝘀𝗼𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗽𝘆𝗹 𝗔𝗹𝗰𝗼𝗵𝗼𝗹 (𝗜𝗣𝗔) 𝗦𝗽𝗿𝗮𝘆: This 500ml Isopropanol (IPA) trigger spray delivers the highest purity product, ensuring safe and effective cleaning and disinfecting. Ideal for a variety of surfaces including electronics, glass, and metal, this purest IPA is perfect for home, office, and industrial cleaning tasks.
description: Product description Conquer Dirt and Germs with Siramico's British Made & Tested Super Powerful Lab Grade 99.9% Isopropyl Alcohol using our versatile trigger spray bottle. Tackle even the toughest cleaning challenges with this high-performance trigger spray Isopropyl Alcohol. This versatile cleaning solution is formulated with 99.9% Isopropanol Alcohol (also known as Rubbing Alcohol for Cleaning), making it a powerful disinfectant that eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria. Isopropyl Alcohol (or IPA for short) is your one-stop shop for cleaning a variety of surfaces. Use it on countertops, appliances, electronics, and more to remove dirt, grime, and fingerprints. Cleaning Alcohol (Isopropyl) leaves everything disinfected and sparkling clean. Is your tech & electronics in need of a refresh? No problem! Isopropyl Alcohol is also a safe and effective way to clean delicate electronics like smartphones, tablets, computer screens, and keyboards. You can clean with confidence knowing it wont damage your devices. Looking for a streak-free shine on your windows and glass surfaces? This Alcohol Cleaner is your secret weapon. The powerful 99% Isopropyl Alcohol formula cuts through dust, dirt and fingerprints, leaving everything sparkling clean. Ingredients Isopropyl
